overview: Following his success with Kickboxing director Sebastian Lore once again has created another exceptional film with a superior cast. Dolph Knight could very well become the newest rage in gay eroticism. But here, he is only one of a bounty of beauties. The entire cast are all worthy of stardom in their own right. Take a stroll through this Majestic Knight. Youâ€™ll be glad you did.
title: Majestic Knights
